channel.title: ccValidator on Nathan R. Yergler
channel.description: Recent content in ccValidator on Nathan R. Yergler

item.title: ccValidator Updated
item.description: Looking in the archive, I see that I haven’t blogged about ccValidator in over six months.

item.title: validator.creativecommons.org Now Available
item.description: I’m pleased to announce that ccValidator now has a new home.

item.title: Development Update
item.description: As I mentioned before , I’ve been hacking on an update of ccValidator.

item.title: ccValidator Refactoring
item.description: It’s been pointed out that ccValidator only supports RDF embedded in an HTML comment, and not any of the other officially sanctioned ways .

item.title: ccValidator 1.3.1 Update Now Available
item.description: As promised yesterday, I’ve updated ccValidator with a minor update.

item.title: Validator updated; Testers needed
item.description: This morning I finished an update to ccValidator .

item.title: ccV Results Are Ugly
item.description: I was on campus last night and checked my e-mail between classes.

item.title: Magnets are cool; or, Yet another validator update
item.description: I’ve been reading the Magnet URI Spec , and the idea behind it’s pretty cool.

item.title: Sourcecode Available
item.description: Just a quick note that you can now download the sourcecode for the ccValidator from here .

item.title: Validator Improvements
item.description: I’ve just moved an improved license validator into place .

item.title: Proposed Changes to the Validator
item.description: Thanks to the feedback I’ve received about the Creative Commons license validator, I now have a list of improvements and changes to implement.

item.title: Yet another ccValidator update
item.description: It seems like all I’m writing about here lately is ccValidator and ccLicense, but I suppose that’s OK.

item.title: ccValidator Fixes
item.description: Based on yesterday’s excellent feedback, I’ve updated the ccValidator code to it’s new, improved version.

item.title: Why didn’t I think of that sooner?
item.description: Shortly after announcing the validator to the cc-metadata list this morning, I had my first bug report.

item.title: Creative Commons License Validator
item.description: Well, what good is a weekend not spent coding?
